comments: Positive attitude, fair grades, reasonable guy, competent with the material, speaks good English. Definitely a good choice.

I had him at Wentworth. Great teacher. He is very helpful, great at teaching, and his class is not boring at all. I wrote some of my best essays in his class because of his leniency and quality in teaching

Dr. Terry Chance is the best teacher I have ever had. He is so inspiring and has lived the most interesting life. He played guitar for Conway Twitty for 25 years and toured the country. He is the coolest guy and genuinely cares about his students as if they were his own children. Fantastic teacher. Fantastic guy all around. TAKE HIS COURSE
The nicest guy ever. Inspirational, funny, understanding, and also a good teacher. You will never feel stressed about this class.
Terry Chance was the man. He is a great teacher and passionate.

I had Dr. Chance a couple years ago for College Writing I and II. He was hands down the best teacher I have ever had.. Besides being the most interesting person I have ever met, you could tell how passionate he was about teaching and he made me become a much better writer because of it. I would love to take more classes with Dr. Chance

AWE SHIT! this guy was the best teacher i have ever had. he has had a veryy interesting life and loves to share his experiences. Great guy. wish i was 21 when i had him cause i would hang out with this guy and have a few beers with him

I have had two classes with Dr. Chance and wish I could take more. He loves his students and wants them to do well. He has changed my life...I actually love to read now. You will not regret taking him.
Best teacher I have ever had. He is caring and really cares about his students. Anyone who does not take highly does not know what they are talking about. Great Professor...take his class.

I really enjoyed his easy-going personality in the beginning of the semester. Then he was out most of the time for health reasons. He told us he was going to count attendance and changed his mind. I sent him an e-mail with concerns about the final 10 page research paper and he sent the rudest, most unprofessional e-mail back to the ENTIRE CLASS regarding the issue. After this bad experience, wouldn\'t recommend him to another student as long as I live! Very unprofessional.
Very intelligent and open minded man. Makes class fun because of his great personality. Was out a lot because of health reasons but i still learnt a lot. Absolutely recommend him

Terry Chance was one of the best teachers I have ever had. He really cares about his students and wants them to do well. Hes really funny and laid back and his class was always enjoyable. He teaches very well and i garuntee you will leave his class a better writer. i would love to take another class with him.
